programme.title: The Pangea-ing
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Potty Mouth
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tinas search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabithas research paper and for Baby Corps online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Not Lout
programme.desc: When Snotlout screws up a mission, he must learn to be a leader and earn the trust of the other riders.

programme.title: That Sinking Feeling
programme.desc: When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: Charged Up
programme.desc: Magnuss superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the towns real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Mailed Away / The Wandering Wand
programme.desc: When Harper unknowingly drops her cooking camp application on the way to post office, it’s up to the Dew Drops to get it into that big blue mailbox. / When Cassie accidentally places Lolas beloved, old toy wand in a box marked for a giveaway drive in the park, the Dew Drops must find a way to retrieve the wand before it ends up in the hands of an entirely new family.

programme.title: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Kens Heart Is
programme.desc: When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Tail to the Chief / Chaser and Chewer: Part Chew
programme.desc: When Tag volunteers to be Mayor for the day, she promises everyone an ice cream party. But as she tries to do everything herself, the party plans begin to fall apart. Until Tag realizes that being a great Mayor means knowing when to ask for help. / Comic book villains Flea and Thunder (aka Frank and Beans) have teamed up with a Wicked Chicken to cause chicken-related havoc on Pawston. Heroes Chaser and Chewer (aka Tag and Scooch), team up with Flora Fedora (Lady Lydia) to save the town.

programme.title: Belly Flop
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when hes swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Daks awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Lucky Penny / Hammy’s Day Out
programme.desc: Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now it’s up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus’ pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Sandstorm
programme.desc: The Dinotrux get caught in a powerful sandstorm that stops them in their tracks, which leaves Ty Rux and the Reptools to find a way to save them.

programme.title: Fake Ravine
programme.desc: When the Dinotrux settle together in the crater, D-Structs decides to go after their most important resource: the Reptools.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool
programme.desc: After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! Its now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. programme.title: Podlings / Dumpster Dining
programme.desc: Ohs family reunion ends up turning into a disastrous family Tip and Oh secretly turn Lucys craft store into a trendy new Boovian restaurant.

programme.title: Boy Boy Girl Band / Lords And Lazers
programme.desc: Tip and Oh try sneaking into a concert but almost destroy Human-Boov relations forever; K-Trong invites Tip and Oh to a make-believe game weekend.

programme.title: Lucky and the Rough Ride
programme.desc: The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, it’s up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Lucky and the Ghostly Gotcha!
programme.desc: When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare he’ll never forget!

programme.title: Lucky and the Doomed Delivery
programme.desc: Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: War of the Cheeks
programme.desc: Boss searches for evidence that Tabithas best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks

programme.title: Techy Tykes
programme.desc: Trying to win Tabithas loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (whos tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Birthday Blues
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Bosss old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Chain Of Command
programme.desc: Krogen is on the hunt for dragon lenses and Snotlout and Minden do their best to defend Wing Island. Back in Berk Dagur and Mala feud over keeping the lenses safe

programme.title: Very Foreign Exchange Student / Pigs Tail
programme.desc: Tips new friend, the Roidian, stays with the Tuccis in hopes of learning from humans; Tip accidentally swaps bodies with Pig.

programme.title: Night Creatures
programme.desc: King Julien cant sleep so he decides to go on a milk cleanse to help but after Todd is attacked by a horrible monster King Juliens nightmares cause the kingdom to question him as...THE NIGHT CREATURE

programme.title: Lucky and the Jam Jam
programme.desc: The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fool’s Day fever

programme.title: Shell On Wheels/Keep On Truckin
programme.desc: Skidmark competes with rich snail Shellsworth to build a railroad; Turbo and Chet roadtrip with their trucker dad and protect their cargo from bandits.

programme.title: Postmortem
programme.desc: Tensions run high within team Voltron as they discuss Lotor’s fate and try to figure out their next move

programme.title: Big Top Peabody/Taj Mahal
programme.desc: In a circus-themed show, Peabody and Sherman break their glasses and cant see their circus shenanigans, which creates a wacky spectacle to be seen

programme.title: King Stingo
programme.desc: Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isnt long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Hide And Seek
programme.desc: The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifis delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: The Case Of The Pink Lettuces
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening at the farm - all Farmer Toms lettuces have been painted pink! Farmer Tom is really upset so Noddy offers to investigate. After talking to PatPat and Smartysaurus he realises that the Ninjas had asked Smartysaurus to make them pink paint so that they could paint the lettuces. They were using them as pom-poms to cheerlead Pink Ninja as she ran the Toyland Marathon Race! The Ninjas are very sorry that they upset Farmer Tom but he tells them that its alright.

programme.title: The Case Of The Missing Jigsaw Puzzle Pieces
programme.desc: When some pieces from Big Ears jigsaw puzzle go missing, Noddy investigates: where are the missing pieces? He soon realises someone must have taken them and draws up a list of suspects. Having discounted the Pirates and then the Naughticorns, Noddy is baffled. But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasnt one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece.

programme.title: Why Leopard Has Spots
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Leopard didnt have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes… but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Hyena Has Short Back Legs
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Hyena didnt have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: New Juice
programme.desc: Conrod is visiting Silver Hatch to try out some new bio fuel. But Big Chris fears something is wrong with it after he comes out in spots after sampling a smoothie made from the same produce. What or who could be at fault?

programme.title: Fb For Football
programme.desc: The cars are having a football tournament down at the beach. FB learns that if he relaxes, his natural footballing skills will shine through.

programme.title: Game of Horns
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: The Puppy Whisperer / Doggy Book of World Records
programme.desc: Tag becomes jealous when Yip prefers to spend time with puppy-sitter Beans instead of with her. Determined to win Yip back, Tag enlists the help of Cheddar Biscuit, Gilber, Spike and Frank to try and win him back. / Frank and Beans find out that Tag and Scooch are trying to get into the Doggy Book of World Records and sabotage every attempt. When Tag and Scooch find out what the sneaky duo are up to, they come up with a plan to outsmart them.

programme.title: Breaking Good
programme.desc: When Dulcinea sets up a school to teach unruly thieves how to be good, Uli takes the idea too far and its up to Puss to make San Lorenzo normal

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive
programme.desc: Melvin isnt exactly their friend ... but its not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Poison Ravine
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Imaginary Friends
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tinas imaginary friend, hes forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, hes forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Saving Shattermaster
programme.desc: When Mala and the Defenders of the Wing find a mysterious stranger who looks suspiciously like Dagur, Hiccup and Heather go to investigate.

programme.title: The Jungle Rooster
programme.desc: When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove theyre kind and helpful.

programme.title: The Yarn Fairy / Bake It ‘Til You Make It
programme.desc: When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think theyre a mysterious "Yarn Fairy," and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves.

programme.title: Crabby / Spe-shell
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: That Stinking Feeling / Go for The Gold
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: The Puppy Whisperer / Doggy Book of World Records
programme.desc: Tag becomes jealous when Yip prefers to spend time with puppy-sitter Beans instead of with her. Determined to win Yip back, Tag enlists the help of Cheddar Biscuit, Gilber, Spike and Frank to try and win him back. / Frank and Beans find out that Tag and Scooch are trying to get into the Doggy Book of World Records and sabotage every attempt. When Tag and Scooch find out what the sneaky duo are up to, they come up with a plan to outsmart them.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Daks lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leylas overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Things That Go Bump / Hide Like a Dew Drop
programme.desc: When "something" starts snatching things and causing havoc in Marcus house, Phoebe and the Dew Drops investigate only to find that its a stray kitten that they need to catch and find a home for before Marcus returns home. But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isnt very good at "Hide and Seek" so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! And now she’s going to be late to her own surprise tea party!

programme.title: Crabby / Spe-shell
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: New Tail
programme.desc: D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove hes still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Ottos
programme.desc: When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor whos huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive its an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Crabby / Spe-shell
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Lucky Penny / Hammy’s Day Out
programme.desc: Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now it’s up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus’ pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Tips Deep Dish / Garbage Day
programme.desc: When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Very Foreign Exchange Student / Pigs Tail
programme.desc: Tips new friend, the Roidian, stays with the Tuccis in hopes of learning from humans; Tip accidentally swaps bodies with Pig.

programme.title: Lucky and the Doubtful Drought
programme.desc: When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: Lucky and the Arabian Nightmares
programme.desc: When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Lucky and the Fearless Fillies
programme.desc: When the PALs and Snips get caught in a sandstorm, the girls must keep Snips calm and safe

programme.title: Sitting Ducks
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tinas first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: The Big Dumpling
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corps super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: The Dragon Knights Part 2
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Puss In Book
programme.desc: While out fighting off ninja pirates, Puss stumbles on a fairy tale book. When he opens it, the adventure begins, as the viewer must choose each outcome, eventually freeing Puss from the book.

programme.title: Loyal Order Of Ingerman
programme.desc: After learning that his ancestors once hunted dragons Fishlegs goes out on a journey to find a Dramillion dragon while being faced with the challenge to clear his family name.

programme.title: Big Brain Boov / Pook Pooks
programme.desc: When Tip cant solve a homework problem, Oh takes them to the Big Brain Boov; Oh feels he cant "Pook Pook" in front of Tip, creating a gross mix-up.

programme.title: Tears In The Drain
programme.desc: When Detective King Julien searches for a missing Butterfish he notices lemurs acting strange all around and realizes he has a serious mystery on his hands so he must get the Mystery Solving Team back together

programme.title: Lucky and the Escape Artist
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky "borrows" Snips for a day to see what it’s like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Desserted Island/Dry Spell
programme.desc: The crew gets stranded on a candy-filled mystery island; Burn isnt herself after a losing streak so the crew goes to extreme lengths to help her win.

programme.title: Kral Zera
programme.desc: While the team struggles to come to an agreement, Haggar’s motives to take the throne escalate to epic proportions

programme.title: World Records/Hotu Matua
programme.desc: Sherman tries to set a world record - live on the show - but after failing each time, Peabody shows him that he did set a world record after all

programme.title: My Friend Fifi
programme.desc: Fifi and Bumble fall out in a big way after Fifi doesnt show up to the picnic they are supposed to have together. How strange that Stingo is trying to get them to be friends again, or is it?

programme.title: Digglys Big Adventure
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: The Case Of The Disappearing Rainbow
programme.desc: Its Fable Forest Rainbow Day when the big rainbow in Fable Forest sparkles and pops like a giant firework. Everyone is looking forward to it until the colours start fading from the rainbow! Noddy needs to investigate before the rainbow disappears for good! Revs converts into a helicopter so that Noddy and Bumpy can fly over the rainbow to find the pot of rainbow gold. They discover that Cloppycorn has been taking the gold from the pot to give his unicorn horn a special golden glow.

programme.title: The Case Of The Flying Toy
programme.desc: When Noddy sees Deltoid flying in the air he decides to investigate: how can they get Deltoid down? Realising that magic is involved, Noddy goes to see Queen Sparklewings to see if she can help but she tells him her wand has gone missing. Someone must be trying to do magic with her wand! Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus.

programme.title: Why Ants Work Together
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Ants didnt work together. The Ants desperately wanted to build themselves a home, but all the animals kept sitting on them, or sneezing them far away or swooping them up into tall trees! On the point of giving up, one brave, young soldier ant rallies the troops… "Pamoja! Together! Together they can do anything!!!"… and he was right. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Flea Jumps
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Flea didnt jump. Flea didnt really move at all. She was very big and very round. All Flea wanted to do was to see the world. The Tinga Tinga animals try to help lift Flea high up, but she is too heavy. Then Tortoise comes up with an idea ‘Movement and activity! and after many attempts Flea discovers that she can jump. She can jump really high! Then Flea can jump everywhere and see everything.! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Mr Carburettors Birthday Suit
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor is off to try out his new wetsuit at the beach… it may come in useful when rain is forecast for the big race the next day!

programme.title: Big Bangs
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor is planning a big firework display up at the farm. Can Roary help Tin Top overcome his fear of bangs in time for the display?

programme.title: Boo to You
programme.desc: Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he cant get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: The Pawmazing Race
programme.desc: One of Tag’s biggest dreams is to be a contestant on her favorite TV game show: The Pawmazing Race, hosted by Kelly Korgi. Which is why she entered her entire family to compete in the family edition! And now that dream is finally coming true! / The Barker Family continue their quest to become the winners of The Pawmazing Race. But the challenges only get tougher from here on out. Tag learns that her family’s quirky traits can help them through any obstacle.

programme.title: Written By
programme.desc: When Dulcinea searches for clues on the Crown of Souls, she finds the author of the Wee Compendium book and holds him hostage until she gets answers

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada
programme.desc: Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: The Master Key
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Turf War
programme.desc: Its a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Babys tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Dire Straits
programme.desc: Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berks trade.

programme.title: The Good Book
programme.desc: Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party

programme.title: Where Theres Smoke
programme.desc: After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Chore Score / Dew Drop Swap
programme.desc: On Harper’s first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harper’s Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they’ re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.desc: Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvins new animal hybrid invention to create a creature thats a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Lucky and the Cousin Caper
programme.desc: Lucky and the PALs must rescue Julian after he gets in too deep while pledging a secret society at his school

programme.title: Lucky and the Wayward Wedding
programme.desc: Jim and Kate are getting married... or are they?

programme.title: Untitled Templeton Project
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the town’s faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Biscuits Rising
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who’s been hired to wreck Boss and Tina’s lives. Crispin puts the new company’s loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: The Pangea-ing
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: The Poison Ravine
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: The Master Key
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Animal House
programme.desc: As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: The Terrible Twos
programme.desc: When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragon’s bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: In Dragons We Trust
programme.desc: After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out what’s really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Lucky and the Resolutionary Fever
programme.desc: Lucky rushes to complete all of last year’s resolutions before the clock strikes midnight on New Year’s Eve

programme.title: Lucky and the Cousin Caper
programme.desc: Lucky and the PALs must rescue Julian after he gets in too deep while pledging a secret society at his school

programme.title: Where Women Rule the Roost - Keeping Zapotec Tradition Alive

programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. Its a closely scored bout, but one fighters push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: World Team Championships

programme.title: Frank Mir, Urijah Faber, Jon Fitch and more!
programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husbands career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.title: WCCB Gervonta Davis vs. Hector Luis Garcia
programme.desc: Five time World Champion and boxing superstar Gervonta Tank Davis and undefeated World Champion Hector Luis Garcia kick off the year by headlining a stacked card from the Capital One Arena in Washington DC. Davis has established himself as one boxings must-see attractions, and will be defending his WBA Lightweight World Championship against Garcia in the Main Event.

programme.title: Budpaest 2023 - Episode 2
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Dont miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC light middleweight title bout when Shane Mosley battles Saul (Canelo) Alvarez, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan: Show 4
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Goeido, Abi, Kisenosato and Tochinoshin from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxings most colorful champions. Hector Camachos dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camachos best fights from the legendary USAs Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector Macho Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.desc: In the season finale of American Ninja Warrior, the top contestants from across the nation compete in the ultimate athletic challenge. With the bright lights of Las Vegas shining on the finalists and the crowd cheering on the competition, the ANW finale celebrates the passion of all the aspiring Ninja Warriors that pursued the privilege to grapple with the famously intimidating Mount Midoriyama.

Ward (25-0, 13 KOs) vs. Chad Dawson (31-1, 17 KOs) in a championship contest from the Oracle Arena in Oakland, California, USA, on September 8, 2012. A paid attendance of 7,611 brought in a gate of $706,469 and 1.

programme.title: Las Vegas Finale: Part 2
programme.desc: In the season finale of American Ninja Warrior, the top contestants from across the nation compete in the ultimate athletic challenge. With the bright lights of Las Vegas shining on the finalists and the crowd cheering on the competition, the ANW finale celebrates the passion of all the aspiring Ninja Warriors that pursued the privilege to grapple with the famously intimidating Mount Midoriyama.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Ricky Hatton vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of fighters who have just one loss to their record, as Ricky Hatton battles Paulie Malignaggi in a light welterweight championship bout that was billed as "Power vs. Precision." Also on the card, future heavyweight champion Tyson Fury battles with Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan: Show 5
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Hakuho, Goeido, Kakuryu and Takayasu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxings most colorful champions. Hector Camachos dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camachos best fights from the legendary USAs Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Andrew Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha
programme.desc: This episode features main event Andrew One Gear Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha for the heavyweight title. From EFC71 in Carnival City, Johannesburg, South Africa on 23-June-2018.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Derrell Coley vs. Kip Diggs / Fernando Vargas vs. Jose Morales
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another excitingGreatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. In a fight for the vacant NABF Welterweight Championship, evenly matched Derrell Coley (29-1-2) and Kip Diggs (27-2) square off in what would be a classic back-and-forth battle, with multiple knockdowns and a fight to close to call on the judges scorecards.

programme.title: Food Truck
programme.desc: The Bears open up a food truck after being disappointed by the food options available to them. They start selling their food to animals... until the animals go a little crazy.

programme.title: Primal
programme.desc: Have the Bears lost their survival instincts by living in the modern world? Grizz wants to know, so he purposely gets the Bears lost in the deep forest.

programme.title: Ben 24hrs
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen attempt to stay up all night for Adrenaland but Ben fails to utilise his alien powers to stay awake and starts causing disaster after disaster.

programme.title: Freaky Gwen Ben
programme.desc: Ben interferes with malicious magician Hexs quest for the Titan Gloves at a flea market and accidentally switches bodies with Gwen, forcing him to walk a mile in her shoes and vice-versa!

programme.title: Rustbucket Rip
programme.desc: During a tour of historic Oldeville, Ben finds a rare Sumo Slammers card. When Billy Billions claims the same card, Ben has to battle Billys high-tech drones which have hijacked the Rust Bucket!

programme.title: The Clocktopus
programme.desc: In a peaceful coastal town, Ben must not only face the archaic antagonist Steam Smythe and his latest creation - the Clocktopus - but also his deepest, darkest fear: squid!

programme.title: Growing Pains
programme.desc: During a stop at the superstore Shoppe, Ben and Gwen are transformed into babies by nanny-gone-nuts Nanny Nightmare, who will stop at nothing to reshape the world in the image of her day care.

programme.title: The Prince And The Swoony Swanstress
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe and Bert take a lovely, but lost and confused, Swanstress under their wing.

programme.title: The Prince And The Feather Fluffer-Upper Part 1
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe and Bert reluctantly agree to bring Princess Syllabob, of the Underwater Kingdom, an all-powerful Trident for her Sweet Sixteenth birthday.

programme.title: The Prince And The Feather Fluffer-Upper Part 2
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe and Bert reluctantly agree to bring Princess Syllabob, of the Underwater Kingdom, an all-powerful Trident for her Sweet Sixteenth birthday.

programme.title: The Prince And The Feast Of The Fopdoodles
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe reluctantly accepts an invitation to a Royal MidSwanner Feast.

programme.title: The Prince And The Boasty Boar
programme.desc: In an attempt to win the hand of Princess Jezabel, Boaris Von Tusk stages a tournament to prove that he is the greatest warrior in all The Five Kingdoms.

programme.title: A Home For Fido
programme.desc: Chris, Elmo and Abby help Fido feel proud that hes a frog and find the right habitat to live in.

programme.title: Sesame Streets Lunar New Year Celebration
programme.desc: Lily, Qui, and Ji-Young are celebrating Lunar New Year on Sesame Street. They share with their friends Elmo, Charlie, Alan, and Grover how their families celebrate the same holiday, doing some things the same and different in a lot of other ways, too.

programme.title: Beebo Saves Christmas
programme.desc: Beebo and his friends travel to the North Pole to help discover what truly makes Christmas meaningful.

programme.title: The Emperors New Clothes
programme.desc: The well-known fable becomes a colorful Asian fairy tale featuring the voice of Gedde Watanabe as the vain emperor.

programme.title: Ben 10: Ben Gen 10
programme.desc: Ben must defeat the dark wizard Vilgax to save the world.

programme.title: Dolly Partons Mountain Magic Christmas
programme.desc: Dolly finds herself taking a private journey into her past, guided by the mysterious appearances of her personal Three Wise Men.

programme.title: Everyday Bears
programme.desc: Its a normal day for the Bears. This means that Ice gets in a fight with a Roomba, Pandas life gets turned upside down when a mouse invades his room, and Grizz gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Nom Nom
programme.desc: When Nom Nom shows up on the Bears doorstep, dishevelled and deposed from his spot as cutest internet star ever after a recent meltdown, he enlists the Bears to help him regain his title.

programme.title: The Road
programme.desc: This episode takes place when the Bears are young cubs! The three, on their way through the desert, come upon a giant warehouse and they try to make this paradise their home.

programme.title: Shush Ninjas
programme.desc: The Bears are fed up with the decay of etiquette at todays theatres and take it upon themselves to be the police of the theatre.

programme.title: Pet Shop
programme.desc: The three Baby Bears try to get adopted at a pet shop and find a new home.

programme.title: Villain Time
programme.desc: Ben must turn alien to save the Hoover Dam from disaster, but when tough guy hero Tim Buktu swoops in to help, Ben must figure out if Tim is friend or foe.

programme.title: Something I Ate
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max go on a tour of the impervious Fort Knox, but when Dr. Animo incites a hungry ani-mutate to attack the Fort, Ben must stop it before it gobbles up the nations monetary standard!

programme.title: Dont Let The Bass Drop
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen are excited to attend an Earth Day EDM concert in Portland until the show is hijacked by the sound-manipulating baddy, Lord Decibel, who uses sound as a weapon to trash the planet.

programme.title: Cutting Corners
programme.desc: Ben approaches Geezer Bob about doing a little yard work to earn spending money and accidentally draws the ire of Bobs gnome-neighbours: the tiny, terrifyingly tenacious Billy-Bob Goblins.

programme.title: Animo Farm
programme.desc: Ben stumbles into Dr. Animos secret lab - now ruled by his superior mutants, the Alphas - and must help the lesser animals escape while stuck as Stinkfly.

programme.title: The Prince And The Blobby Princess
programme.desc: Princess Syllabob, the blobby daughter of Axalotly, King of the Deep, has been carried off by a gang of gulls and discarded on the forest floor.

programme.title: The Prince And The Wise Wizard Of Wisdom
programme.desc: Struck down by a poisonous turnip, Prince Ivandoe and Bert must seek a cure from the Wise Wizard of Wisdom.

programme.title: The Prince And The Squeak Of Obedience
programme.desc: Feral and her gang of cat-thieves have stolen Prince Ivandoes map to Eagle Mountain. Cupcake, the pink-poodle survivalist offers to train Prince Ivandoe to become a Jungle Warrior

programme.title: The Prince And The Princenappers
programme.desc: Whilst travelling through the notoriously dangerous Forest of Outlaws, Prince Ivandoe is repeatedly Princenapped!

programme.title: The Prince And The Playdate Part 1
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe is a prisoner in the castle dungeon of Jezabels mother, Grizabella - the unpredictable and slightly terrifying Queen of Thieves.

programme.title: Elmo Helps The Amazing Zero!
programme.desc: The Amazing Zero and Elmo are on Sesame Street to help people by taking everything away when they need it to get to zero.

programme.title: The Grover Game
programme.desc: Welcome to Street Carnival Day! Cookie Monster is playing the Grover Game and needs to move ping pong balls off a plate without touching them. What if he blows through a tube to move the balls? Lets try!

programme.title: 10,000 BC
programme.desc: A young mammoth hunter leads a band of hunters to rescue his love in this prehistoric epic.

programme.title: Over The Hedge
programme.desc: When a newly developed suburb threatens the livelihood of a group of local animals, a savvy raccoon named RJ comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Chance Of A Lifetime
programme.desc: An overweight, homely woman unexpectedly finds love with her longtime male friend when they are forced into a fake marriage with each other.

programme.title: Elmo Helps The Amazing Zero!
programme.desc: The Amazing Zero and Elmo are on Sesame Street to help people by taking everything away when they need it to get to zero.

programme.desc: The team launches an incredible nighttime 200-drone light show experiment above the Triangle and the East Field leading to a startling sighting in the sky and new data that points toward possible answers.

programme.title: The Top Ten Alien Influencers
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos looks at mysterious teachers who have appeared throughout history and reveals The Top Ten Alien Influencers, who he believes provide the ultimate proof of extraterrestrial contact.
Jaime meets the Finest Female surfer in the Philippines, the Queen of Cloud 9, Nildie Rietenbach. Can she conquer the waves after a single lesson?
While Jaime heads for Puerto Princesa Underground River through a mangrove swamp, she is offered a local snack - a shipworm from a rotting log.

programme.title: The Wormhole
programme.desc: With only four people remaining, food insecurity reaches an all-time high. One participants prized harvest is pilfered, while another survivalist battles a debilitating sickness.

programme.title: Bear Lair
programme.desc: In Idaho, Kidd and Harry Youren hunt a bear that tore up their camp, but the chase leads them into a confrontation. In Alaska, Martha and Elli Tansy try to bring down a bull moose.

programme.title: Captain Pickle
programme.desc: Pickle gets her shot to be captain, but Troy struggles to hand over the reins. Jacob takes his son gator hunting for the first time. Ronnie and Ashley fish in a traditional pirogue.

programme.title: Rick And Mortar
programme.desc: With the help of science, the Fellowship uncovers an irrefutable connection between the Money Pit and Lot 5.

programme.title: Holiday Treats
programme.desc: The top-selling candy days of the year revolve around Easter, Valentines Day, and Halloween. And it all started with a few bold pioneers.

programme.title: Denver Gold Rush
programme.desc: Rick, Corey and Chum are betting big and putting it all on red, white and blue! The cast of Pawn Stars are leaving Vegas and hitting the road to meet with collectors from all around the country.

programme.title: Declaration Of Indepawndence
programme.desc: Rick heads to New York City to check out an original broadside of the Declaration of Independence. Will he put his John Hancock on the line for this multi-million-dollar piece of history?

programme.title: Lights and Lasers
programme.desc: Tim Allen, Richard Karn and April Wilkerson set their sights on lights and lasers. In Tims workshop, the team attempt to foil a Mission: Impossible-style security grid created by a pair of laser experts.

programme.title: Magnets
programme.desc: Tim Allen, Richard Karn and April Wilkerson feel the attraction of magnets. In Tims workshop, they use magnets for several helpful hacks and Tim tangles with ultra-powerful rare earth magnets.

programme.title: Chefs Special
programme.desc: Four smiths get cooking when they are tasked with forging a chefs knife. After a round of testing performed by a professional chef, only two head back to their home forge to build a brutal hog splitter.

programme.title: Symphony Of Solitude
programme.desc: As the river finally begins to freeze, the remaining survivalists struggle with the loss of daylight. One participants snare line gets stalked by a predator; another devises a plan to defeat an enemy.

programme.title: The Dyatlov Pass Incident
programme.desc: An infamous Cold War cold case: nine hikers were found mutilated on a remote mountain slope. For over 60 years, authorities and amateurs have been trying to figure out what happened.

programme.desc: Four bladesmiths enter the forge to compete in a Forged in Fire first: the Knife Fight. Arriving with their best blades in hand, competitors will immediately be put to the test and one will be eliminated.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2023/2024 (MNC)
programme.desc: The 2023/24 Premier League season will be forever remembered as one of the greatest campaigns ever. From an absorbing title race, Jurgen Klopp leaving Liverpool to Luton living the dream in the top-flight - Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Widely regarded as the two best managers in Premier League history, Sir Alex Ferguson and Arsene Wenger went toe to toe on the touchline on numerous occasions over the years. But what made their rivalry so fierce? We take a look at the intense clashes, memorable moments on and off the pitch and the monumental impact their duels had on English footballs modern era.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: In the first senior managers job of his career, Kieran McKenna has achieved something nobody else has managed this decade: Winning back-to-back promotions from League One to the Premier League, in the process ending Ipswichs 22-year absence from top flight football. We go behind the scenes with the team as they prepare for the opening game of the new season whilst also exploring the clubs unique history.

programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: From his early days in Finland to lifting the Champions League trophy in 2005, we chart Sami Hyypiäs journey to the top of English football. We join him for a snowmobiling adventure across the icy wilderness of Finland and though interviews and personal moments, showcase not only his leadership and skill on the pitch but also his deep connection to his roots.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Before stepping into the dugout, Martin ONeill was part of one of footballs most iconic teams with Brian Cloughs Nottingham Forest. Hear from Martin as he shares stories from his remarkable journey across nearly five decades in the game. From European heartbreak, to promotional triumph, discover what shaped his extraordinary career, both on the field and from the sidelines.

programme.desc: Former Southampton, Fulham and Finland goalkeeper Antti Niemi chooses his dream team from the teammates he shared a Premier League pitch with.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: We gather a panel of experts to tackle a nearly impossible question: What truly is the Greatest Premier League Game Ever? Join two ex-footballers, a seasoned commentator, and a top football journalist as they lock horns in a passionate roundtable discussion. The panel revisits iconic moments, dissecting tactics, and legendary performances. Expect banter, bold claims, and maybe even a few surprises, as they strive to settle the debate-or perhaps keep it alive.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: This will be the first league meeting between Ipswich Town and Crystal Palace since March 2013, and a 3-0 Championship win for the Tractor Boys at Portman Road.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Leicester won both Premier League meetings with West Ham in 2022-23 but haven’t won three consecutive league games against the Hammers since a run of five between 1965 and 1966.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Aston Villa are winless in their last four Premier League games (D2 L2). They last went five without a win between May and August 2022, while they last did so in the same season in March/April 2022 (both runs under Steven Gerrard).

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25 (4K)
programme.desc: Manchester City have won just one of their last 21 Premier League away games against Liverpool (D7 L13), beating them 4-1 in February 2021. They’ve not won at Anfield with fans in attendance since May 2003 (2-1).

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: This will be the first league meeting between Ipswich Town and Crystal Palace since March 2013, and a 3-0 Championship win for the Tractor Boys at Portman Road.

programme.desc: Former Southampton, Fulham and Finland goalkeeper Antti Niemi chooses his dream team from the teammates he shared a Premier League pitch with.

programme.title: PL Stories 2024/25
programme.desc: We gather a panel of experts to tackle a nearly impossible question: What truly is the Greatest Premier League Game Ever? Join two ex-footballers, a seasoned commentator, and a top football journalist as they lock horns in a passionate roundtable discussion. The panel revisits iconic moments, dissecting tactics, and legendary performances. Expect banter, bold claims, and maybe even a few surprises, as they strive to settle the debate-or perhaps keep it alive.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25
programme.desc: Being the only player Pep Guardiola has signed twice, as well as being the first ever Manchester City captain to lift the Champions League, Ilkay Gundogan’s importance to the club cannot be understated. In this week’s Big Interview, we learn how a boy brought up in a German mining town, played under Jurgen Klopp at Borussia Dortmund, suffered multiple long-term injuries and bounced back stronger, became a club legend at City.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: This is Ruben Amorim’s first home league game in charge of Manchester United. Since the start of last season, the Portuguese has won all 22 of his home league games in charge of Sporting CP by an aggregate score of 72-13.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25 (4K)
programme.desc: Arsenal have won their last three Premier League games against Manchester United - they’ve never won four in a row against the Red Devils in their league history.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Newcastle have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool, and are winless in 15 against the Reds since a 2-0 win in December 2015 (D4 L11).

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Wolves have won five of their last six league games against Everton (D1), more victories than they’d managed in their previous 21 against them (W4 D8 L9).

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Brentford have never won an away league game against Aston Villa (D6 L3), with the Bees only facing Stoke (14) and Halifax Town (11) more often on the road without ever winning in their league history.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Southampton have won their last two Premier League games against Chelsea, as many as in their previous 18 (D5 L11). They last won three consecutive league games against the Blues between 1979 and 1985.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Manchester City have conceded 3+ goals in each of their last two home games in all competitions (0-4 vs. Spurs, 3-3 vs. Feyenoord), last doing so in three home games in a row in April/May 1963, a season they were relegated from the top-flight.

programme.title: Homemade Love Story
programme.desc: At a boarding house called Samgwang Villa, three families from different worlds find themselves entangled through love, heartache and long-held secrets.

programme.title: Hilarious Family
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Are You The One
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Forensic Heroes V
programme.desc: The fifth installment of the Forensic Heroes series revolves around the Hong Kong Police Department working through forensics and criminal investigation, getting to the bottom of missing evidence and cunning criminals, and eventually giving justice to victims!

programme.title: Forever Home Or Time To Roam
programme.desc: Newly married with no kids, Gene and Shella settled on a starter home they agreed to move out of after five years. 22 years and two kids later, they still find themselves in the same space.

programme.title: A Chefs Deadly Revenge
programme.desc: Lucy has just escaped an abusive relationship when she meets the kind Frank, but when she discovers that Frank is stalking her, she decides shes had enough of abusive men and turns the tables on Frank.

programme.title: Apprenticing to a Lone Doctor on Niijima (R)
programme.desc: What would I learn if I apprenticed myself to a general physician on an isolated island who faces all kinds of diseases alone? What is the true meaning of his actions like prolonged chats with patients, mysterious notes he handed over, stopping at a park on the way to a medical visit, and snapping a lot of pictures? These brings to light his belief in examining people as well as their illnesses. It also reveals the relationships that inspire the islanders with this way of thinking.

programme.desc: Rubble and Crew work together to find a construction solution when Chargers bouncy birthday surprise needs a lift!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder
programme.desc: Park Ranger Roses favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoes chickens, but when they get loose, its up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.desc: Dora and Boots find an adorable baby axolotl. They have to bring him home, but he keeps wandering off. // The Big Red Chicken gets stuck in a giant floating bubble and is heading straight for a volcano! Dora has to do a mid-air rescue to save him.

programme.title: Picture Imperfect / The Fishy Friends Talent Show
programme.desc: Baby accidentally gets messy on family picture day, and goes to extraordinary lengths to get clean before his parents find out. // Penny and Wallace team up to perform in a two-fishy talent show.

programme.title: The Sharkdog Scoop
programme.desc: When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdogs wild side for the news, she realizes theres nothing scary about Maxs best friend.

programme.title: The Party Animal
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally destroys the boardwalk, Max and Sharkpack must prove to everyone that Sharkdog is a really great pet.

programme.title: Working Like a Sharkdog
programme.desc: All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dads rescue.

programme.title: Mummy Rabbits Bump
programme.desc: Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Pedro the Cowboy
programme.desc: Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa and Georges Garden
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: The Flying Vet
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Chips and Dip / Bees Knees Tea
programme.desc: Chef and Olly make French onion dip, but Chef cant stop crying from the onions! // When the Queen Bee comes to a Stump tea party, Chefs determined to put on a party fit for a queen.

programme.title: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste
programme.desc: Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: The Tenderest Bond of All
programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffle

programme.title: Deep Sea Grand Prix
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ are racing under the ocean! Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line!

programme.title: Recycling Power!
programme.desc: When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, its up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.desc: Capn Turbot and his cousin Francois are observing a pair of mountain goats when a sudden avalanche strikes. // Farmer Al finds mysterious crop circles in his corn field, he calls on the Paw Patrol to find out more.

programme.title: Pups Save a Good Mayor
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Finloose / Operation Ernie
programme.desc: When dancing is outlawed in Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark will do whatever it takes to get the town dancing again! // Baby and William try to help Ernie make a best friend.

programme.title: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire
programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffle. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib cant help to control everything.

programme.title: Paddingtons Favourite Hero / Paddington And The Skateboarder
programme.desc: Paddington struggles to choose a hero for a special photo wall in the park - maybe he needs to look closer to home. // Paddington becomes a heroic skateboarder, thanks to Mateo and a special mask - but how magical is the mask?

programme.title: Road Trip: From Brad to Worse / Road Trip: Doll Day Afternoon
programme.desc: When the Louds run into Moms old camp crush turned celebrity at a State Fair, Dad tries to one-up him to impress Rita. // Realizing Mr. Coconuts is missing, Luan rallies the Louds to track him down along Route 66.

programme.title: Knight Smurfalot / Forget Me What?
programme.desc: Dreamer tries to become a knight, but his annoying antics make him some new enemies that land him in danger. // When Gargamel accidentally breathes in the pollen of a rare flower it instantly wipes his memory.

programme.title: The Smurfs Show
programme.desc: Gargamel plants a crystal ball to spy on the Smurfs, but they turn the tables on him with a fabricated drama.

programme.desc: Deuce wants to show off his pet rat, Perseus, at the Pet Scare, but when Perseus wont participate, Deuce finds a destructive replacement. // Jealous of Jinafire, Heath tries to outdo her climate activism with a superior Climate Science project.

programme.title: A Finata Full Of Death Bugs
programme.desc: When a dangerous pinata ends up at a kids birthday party, Kid Danger and Captain Man must go undercover and step in before its too late.

programme.desc: Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dads new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuelas tale of El Cucuy, and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: Legend of the Lost Bathroom
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina embark on a quest to find the lost bathroom.
