programme.desc: The heist at the Academy doesnt quite go as expected and the girls discover Miss Lucas has an obsession with the Hunters. Another unexpected reveal for Daniel and Evie leaves them reeling. Can Florian be trusted?

programme.title: Text Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: When Taylor discovers a bottle containing Uncle Charlies old mobile phone, with a mysterious text message, the gang are lead to a deserted island with a threatening fog and a piratical past connected to Meeshas family.

programme.title: Face/Off-Model / 5 Star Restaurant
programme.desc: Squidina helps Patrick get back on-model. // The Star family takes over the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: The Salty Sponge / Karen for Spot
programme.desc: SpongeBob works the grill at the toughest joint in town. // Karen looks after Spot while Plankton goes out of town.

programme.title: Arbor Day Disarray / Aint That the Tooth
programme.desc: Sandy gives her friends special saltwater trees, but they need more attention than she expected. // SpongeBob and Patrick mistake a burglar for the tooth fairy.

programme.title: Camp Spirit / Help Not Wanted
programme.desc: SpongeBob, Patrick and Sandy befriend a visiting ghost camper. // Patricks dad unexpectedly visits Kamp Koral.

programme.title: Happy Smurfs Fool Day! / The Wrench Smurf
programme.desc: Its Smurfs Fool Day and Jokey is beside himself with excitement. // When Handy turns the Diaper Daddy Robot into his assistant, the machines memory accidentally gets wiped.

programme.title: Smurf to the Future!
programme.desc: When Handy invents a time machine for Blossom, the duo accidentally goes back to prehistoric times. // Blossom and Handy are taken prisoner by Prehistoric Smurfs who plan on sacrificing Handy to a ferocious beast.

programme.title: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown
programme.desc: When Ronnie Anne realizes that shes not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: V.I.Peeved / Senor Class
programme.desc: Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carls newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teachers Pests
programme.desc: A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBobs there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: Sanitation Insanity / Bunny Hunt
programme.desc: When Mr. Krabs gets in trouble for littering, he makes SpongeBob and Squidward clean up Bikini Bottom. // A sea bunny ravages Squidwards garden, but SpongeBob thinks its cute!

programme.title: Squid Noir / Scavenger Pants
programme.desc: When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: Larry the Floor Manager
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: Pearl Wants to Be a Star / Super Sitters
programme.desc: Pearl stars in a guest appearance on The Patrick Show. // Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new.

programme.title: Finders Weepers
programme.desc: Ronnie and Sid have to decide whether they "borrow" money from a lost coin purse they found in the mercado.

programme.title: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: Europe Road Trip: Nonna Your Business / Europe Road Trip: Alpining Away
programme.desc: The Louds journey to Naples Italy to taste the worlds best pizza, made by a secretive and legendary chef. // When Lynn crushes on a boy in the Swiss Alps, Lori and Leni become her crush coaches to help her talk to him.

programme.title: Europe Road Trip: A Bite of Transylvania / Europe Road Trip: Greece is the Word
programme.desc: When the Louds bus gets a flat tire, theyre invited to stay the night in a spooky couples mysterious castle. // During a tour of the Parthenon, Lincoln puts on a soldiers helmet which sends him back to Ancient Greece.

programme.title: Order of Merit / Smurfy Mothers Day!
programme.desc: When Brainy bosses all the Smurfs around one time too many, Jokey makes him compete for a fake award. // When they get captured by Gargamel, Papa Smurf, Willow and Vanity offer to help the sorcerer impress his mother.

programme.title: Leaping Lizards / Cover Story
programme.desc: Vanitys attempt to cure a zit with a magic spell accidentally turns him into a lizard instead. // To increase interest in the newspaper, Reporter decides to interview Gargamel face to face!

programme.title: Call the Cops! / Surf N Turf
programme.desc: Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: Appointment TV / Karens Virus
programme.desc: The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and its up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: Battle of the Grandpas / Prankaversary
programme.desc: When Fridas fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildrens attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: April Fools Rules / Cereal Offender
programme.desc: Every April Fools Day, Luan pranks the entire household, but this year, Lincoln has a plan to not get pranked. // The Loud kids make a trip to the supermarket to do the grocery shopping for Mom, but Lincoln has other plans.

programme.title: The Loudest Yard / Raw Deal
programme.desc: When Lincolns mom signs him up for peewee football, Lincoln schemes to have Lynn take his spot. // After Lucy reads Lincolns fortune and claims his day will "end in disaster

programme.title: Squidinas Little Helper / I Smell a Pat
programme.desc: The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant whos a little too good at his job.

programme.title: Eek, An Urchin! / Squids Defense
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab, and tries everything to force it out. // After getting his groceries stolen, Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: Codex Come Back / Officially Complicated
programme.desc: After Draculaura accidentally offends the Codex and causes him to run away, she resorts to witchcraft to fix their friendship.//Lagoona must work up the courage to be honest with her ghostly ex-boyfriend when he comes back into her life to haunt her.

programme.title: Return of the Kid
programme.desc: Henry Harts back and stealing Rays attention from crime fighting so Danger Force is forced to go on a bunch of exhausting missions without Captain Man. But the mood dims when a scary Bounty Hunter from Dystopia comes to Swellview looking for Henry.

programme.title: Vidja Games
programme.desc: Danger Force and Captain Man get hooked making celebrity "Holla" videos to start raking in cash. But when making celebrity videos turns into a popularity contest, they accidentally send out a "Holla" video that reveals their secret identities.

programme.title: The Princess and the Everlasting Emerald: A Royal Woods Fairytale Part 2
programme.desc: Still on the quest to give Charlie the perfect gift to remember him by Lincoln and his family put all of their talents on the line for the first ever Loud-a-palooza to save Flips food and fuel.

programme.title: Mouth Candy
programme.desc: Jaspers enthusiasm in crime fighting leads him to send Captain Man and Kid Danger into incidents that are not crimes. So when he is falsely accused of a burglary and sent to jail, Henry and Ray must find a way to set him free.

programme.title: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparents marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.title: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill
programme.desc: When Bobby finds out Carl cant swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort
programme.desc: The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: A Patty in Time
programme.desc: Patrick time-travels in a race for the Krusty Krabs newest menu item.

programme.title: Driven to Drive
programme.desc: In a Patrick Show episode about boats, Cecil teaches Patrick how to drive.

programme.title: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mothers basement.

programme.title: Fandom Pains / Rita Her Rights
programme.desc: Lucy is annoyed that Lori and Leni have started watching her vampire show because of a cute new character. // After getting community service for racking up tickets, Mom finds its more relaxing than being at home.

programme.title: The Mad Scientist / Missed Connection
programme.desc: Lisa gets invited to work at an institute and get away from her crazy family. // Lori and Bobby worry that dating long-distance is causing them to lose their connection.

programme.title: Paw-zzle Pieces
programme.desc: To discover the cause of her mothers disappearance, Clawdeen opens a portal in the catacombs and releases - her brother Clawd?!

programme.title: Spelling and Doorbelling
programme.desc: Lincoln and Clyde find themselves outmatched in the ultimate prank war, meanwhile Lisa takes on a new "sport" with some help from Lynn Jr.

programme.title: Family Lies
programme.desc: Its Parents Night at SW.A.G. and Ray must get Danger Force to take a picture with their parents in the school or be shut down. But things get complicated when Chapa hires Jake Hart to be her fake dad.

programme.title: Earth To Bose
programme.desc: Strange things start to happen to Bose when he finds himself in love with an alien.

programme.title: Beat the Parents
programme.desc: Nervous about meeting his girlfriends parents, Max enlists help from Phoebe, whose charms ultimately backfire and leave Max banned from ever seeing his girlfriend again.

programme.title: Meet the Midknights
programme.desc: When Uncle Budrick is held captive as King Gastleys jester, its up to Max to rescue him from the castles dungeon, with a little help from her newest pals, Simon, Millie, Kevyn, and world-renowned wizard, Mumblin.

programme.title: Lets Break A Deal / A Dish Come True
programme.desc: Rusty strikes a deal with Morpheus that for a seemingly small price, Morpheus will cast spells for him. // Lincoln starts to work at Dads restaurant when he hears that the best employee wins a dish named in their honor.

programme.title: Out of the Picture / Room with a Feud
programme.desc: Afraid theyll be forgotten, Lincoln and Clyde want to make a splash in the yearbook and crash group photos. // Seeing his sisters fight with their roommates, Lincoln suggests a room shuffle based on a compatibility test.

programme.title: Battle of the Grandpas / Prankaversary
programme.desc: When Fridas fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildrens attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.desc: Squidward finds SpongeBobs diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.desc: An imprisoned Plankton teams up with his fellow inmates to break out of jail and steal the Krabby Patty secret formula. // SpongeBob replaces his broken spatula with one from Plankton, which may or may not have magical powers.

programme.title: Constricted
programme.desc: A romantic date ends with a teenager fighting for her life in the hospital; Carisi cant help bringing the case home with him as he envisions the dangers ahead for his growing daughters.

programme.title: Economics Of Shame
programme.desc: When a TV reporter becomes the victim of sextortion that could ruin her career, Benson helps her take back control while Velasco goes undercover as a potential rich target.

programme.title: Roschach
programme.desc: Agent Clay consults with Benson when a woman is found gravely injured at a remote campground and the suspect could be anywhere along the Eastern Seaboard; Bruno and Silva take a chance on an odd hunch to see if it becomes a lead.

programme.title: Tenfold
programme.desc: Bruno must get to the center of a victim’s incomplete story to track down a serial rapist. Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to be committed.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: After five criminals are released from a random police lineup, they plan a major heist that goes horribly awry. The police search for a mysterious crime lord, "Keyser Soze," who seems to be tied to the heist.

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisas mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like youve never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asias most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the worlds most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: World Of Durian
programme.desc: A program that will review all types of durian typical of the archipelago, starting from the history, taste and specialty of each durian.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. Its the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tabula Rasa S3
programme.desc: A religious program that preached by Abu Marlo. He is a former magician that currently become an Indonesian motivator.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Knock The Doc
programme.desc: Talkshow about big issues of human health (both mental and physical) and beauty.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisas mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the worlds most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: World Of Durian
programme.desc: A program that will review all types of durian typical of the archipelago, starting from the history, taste and specialty of each durian.

programme.title: RAMAYANAM
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble and rustic background troubled by familial and financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home and fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Anamika - Thriller Serial
programme.desc: Bound for over 200 years, and in a quest for indomitable power, an evil entity that Anamika releases by ill fate threatens her lover Nandas life and her boss Rishis unrequited love for her. Setting off an age-old battle between good and evil.

programme.title: MALAR
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malars ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner and a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destinys plan for them?

programme.title: Sevvanthi
programme.desc: Destiny plays a cruel role in Sevanthis naive and sheltered life with her dream-come-true husband Mano and his extended family. Watch Sevanthi traverse the nuances of family, despite the challenges life throws at her.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted and burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmadas mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father and his estranged family entwines with Kathirs task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: Punnagai Poove
programme.desc: Ever since destiny united Kalaivani with Chezhiyan during childhood, she has been thinking of him as her prince charming. Will her hopes of a fairy tale life prevail against the odds and hurdles she is about to encounter?

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace and heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds and win over her husbands large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gauthams controlling aunt Bairavi and her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst lifes many hardships?

programme.title: Movie - PAZHANI
programme.desc: Pazhani is released from jail after serving 15 years for killing his fathers mistress. In order to reconcile with his unforgiving sister, he works as a driver at her house and reforms her husband.

programme.title: Choice Husband
programme.desc: Shen Miao is the treasured daughter of the wealthiest merchant in Yangzhou City but is not the luckiest when it comes to marriage. Stay tuned to a twisted love tale shes involved between a talented scholar and rich glib.

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Battle for water

programme.title: Tamara Lempicka

programme.title: The Ringmaster
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: The Last Breakthrough
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force

programme.title: Vigilante Force
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_AH devotes himself to work.

programme.title: Vigilante Force

programme.title: Word Twisters Adventures
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, Des father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Word Twisters Adventures
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, Des father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: The Ringmaster
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.desc: Join Chef Ariffin and Dhivyah Raveen in the brand new season of Super Samayal and find out how to make dishes that are tasty and healthy at the same time.

programme.desc: A continuation of Kalyaanam 2 Kaathal Season 1. The story will expand with more conflicts and involvement of new characters along the way. Get ready to experience another roller coaster ride filled with emotions and romance.

programme.title: Episode 24(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Host, Bala Ganapathi William travels across Malaysia in his search for the most popular street or hawker food. This second season will further guide foodies to the best street food from North to South.

programme.title: (PG)Episode 20(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: A newspaper unit undergoes upheaval when it transits from print to digital. This change parallels the journey of the staff who find themselves at the crossroads, grappling with the challenges that life throws at them.

programme.title: Episode 38(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Super Samayal is back for its 5th season. In this season, we will have 4 different chefs who will focus on different types of cooking and techniques.

programme.title: (PG)Episode 22(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Satya continues to find out why they did not get the project. Will he get closer to the answer? The phone stalker calls Anjali again. What does he want now?

programme.title: (PG)Episode 23(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Raj meets Mano to plan a revenge against Priya and Satya. What are they going to do? Arjun tries repeatedly to console Anjali about the phone stalker. Will Anjali listen to Arjun?

programme.title: (PG)Episode 29(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Nilachoru (Moonrice) is an imaginary food that mothers will feed their kids when their young - pointing to the moon and feeding the rice. Saravanan does the same for his sisters as he had been the parent figure in their lives. Every now and then, they will all gather at Saralas open terrace and have nilachoru and reminisce their childhood.

programme.desc: Kanavu Meipada is a travelogue with a heart.
